string.name: instructions
string.br: 2. Click the "Next" button to add your fingerprint \n
3. Make sure your designated finger is clean to scan \n
4. Wait for the fingerprint light to turn on \n
5. It might take a few seconds to scan your fingerprint \n
6. Repeat for as many fingerprints as needed \n
7. Click the "Finish" button to finish the registration process \n
8. Send back to home screen with "welcome" popup \n
